attributes.action: Berexit,  Lets be the link of the world again and be a port of influence for all
attributes.additional_details:
My name is Matthew Lloyd and i call upon us all to think differently. we are a country and a union that have differences . I believe that out is an improvement on the EU because the union has failed us, that said we can hone our skills to be the hub of all talks, all views taken and most of all take the world forward. none of us are neanderthal we need to live and agree the future but it cannot be done within the EU. 
vote exit in response to the counter vote seen on Petitions.gov
attributes.background: Britain always has been a lynch pin in giving a world view on the future. The european policies have failed us, Democracy has spoken and i call for a new party to be formed which will take our nation forward into the new world. Britain will Prevail and become a nation of valid consultation.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
